mapper.insert: insert into recipe(name, description, ingredients, steps, cooking_time, calories, protein, carbohydrate, fat, category, difficulty, image) values (#{name}, #{description}, #{ingredients}, #{steps}, #{cookingTime}, #{calories}, #{protein}, #{carbohydrate}, #{fat}, #{category}, #{difficulty}, #{image})
mapper.update: update recipe set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, ingredients = #{ingredients}, steps = #{steps}, cooking_time = #{cookingTime}, calories = #{calories}, protein = #{protein}, carbohydrate = #{carbohydrate}, fat = #{fat}, category = #{category}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, image = #{image} where id = #{id}
